msbt.message: Ah, welcome, welcome! You don't waste any time, do you? Oho!
Ah, welcome, welcome! I'm so happy that you've made your way here.

We're still setting up, but for starters we intend to offer a small selection of goods for our island residents. Space is limited right now, but we'll try to have some fresh stock each and every day. I'm sure you're busy, but feel free to take a look at some of the items we're thinking of selling.
Of course! I understand. Stop by anytime.

We're not just sellers. We'll also buy things from you, including stuff gathered on this island. And because we want to support efforts to beautify the islandwe'll even pay you a little bit in return for any weeds or trash you bring in. If you want to know whether we'll buy something, just ask!
If there's something you'd like to purchase, we can do business later.
